details:
adjective
- existing in name only
= example: existing in name only
= synonyms: nominal
- of or associated with or bearing a title signifying nobility
= example: of or associated with or bearing a title signifying nobility
- of or pertaining to the title of a work of art
= example: of or pertaining to the title of a work of art
- of or bearing a title signifying status or function
= example: of or bearing a title signifying status or function
- of or relating to a legal title to something
= example: of or relating to a legal title to something
= synonyms: titulary
